game.name: AutoSquad
game.shortDescription: AutoSquad is a turn-based roguelike autobattler where you build and refine a squad of units, choose their formation and strategy, then watch the battle unfold. Recruit new units, combine them into higher tiers, collect relics, and defeat the final boss.
game.shortDescriptionEn: AutoSquad is a turn-based roguelike autobattler where you build and refine a squad of units, choose their formation and strategy, then watch the battle unfold. Recruit new units, combine them into higher tiers, collect relics, and defeat the final boss.
